code: export var ColorActionTypes={GET_LIST:"GET_LIST",GET_LIST_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_ERROR:"GET_LIST_ERROR"};Object.keys(ColorActionTypes).forEach(function(key){ColorActionTypes[key]="COLOR_".concat(ColorActionTypes[key]);});var onGetList=function onGetList(payload){return{type:ColorActionTypes.GET_LIST,payload:payload};};var onGetListSuccess=function onGetListSuccess(payload){return{type:ColorActionTypes.GET_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};var onGetListError=function onGetListError(error){return{type:ColorActionTypes.GET_LIST_ERROR,payload:error};};var ColorActions={onGetList:onGetList,onGetListSuccess:onGetListSuccess,onGetListError:onGetListError};export default ColorActions;
